text: Rami Said Malek (born May 12, 1981) is an American actor. He is known for his role as Elliot Alderson in the USA Network television series Mr. Robot. For his role as Alderson, he won the Primetime Emmy Award for Outstanding Lead Actor in a Drama Series in 2016. Malek is also known for his roles in the Night at the Museum trilogy, The Pacific (2010), The Twilight Saga: Breaking Dawn â€“ Part 2 (2012), and Short Term 12 (2013). Malek played musician Freddie Mercury in the biographical drama Bohemian Rhapsody (2018). He won a Golden Globe Award and an Oscar for this role in 2019. He later played James Bond villain Lyutsifer Safin in the 2021 movie No Time to Die. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1981 births Category:Living people Category:American Academy Award winning actors Category:Actors from Torrance, California Category:Actors who played Bond villains Category:American movie actors Category:American stage actors Category:American television actors Category:American voice actors Category:Emmy Award winning actors Category:Golden Globe Award winning actors
title: Rami Malek
